MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: ~$ azure vm disk list ubuntuVMasm info: Executing command vm disk list + Fetching disk images + Getting virtual machines + Getting VM disks data: Lun Size(GB) Blob-Name OS data: --- -------- -------------------------------- ----- data: 30 ubuntuVMasm-2645b8030676c8f8.vhd Linux data: 1 10 test.VHD data: 2 30 ubuntuVMasm-76f7ee1ef0f6dddc.vhd info: vm disk list command OK
